Support Black Lives?

Redirect will help you put your money where your mouth is.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit, amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Distinctio nihil eum quibusdam deleniti, quaerat tempore labore eius consequuntur!

How It Works

Open the Redirect extension when shopping on Amazon and search for your favorite products.

Redirect will recommend Black-owned businesses that sell products in the same category.

Click "Visit Site" to shop from a Black-owned alternative and Redirect your shopping money!

Redirect started at a Black Lives Hackathon
